JobFullDesc: At Uber we pride ourselves on the amazing team we've built. The driver behind all our growth, our bold brand, and the ground-breaking technology we bring to market is the people that make Uber. Delivering a premier, on-demand transportation experience takes a critical eye for quality, and we need a Sr. Sourcer who has the same critical eye. Our recruiting team must be able to find the diamonds in the rough and the sourcers are the ones that mine for that talent.Interested? Keep reading!The right person will be comfortable in a "take initiative" environment, loves solving problems and can thrive in a fast and growing environment. This role is all about bringing on the smartest folks, maintaining our culture as we grow, and running an efficient process to keep it moving.What You'll DoYou'll be tasked with supporting our recruiters, hiring managers, building high-performance teams and partnering wherever neededYou will source across all teams; helping to expand our business globallyYou will create robust pipelines while making each candidate feel like they're the only one you're talking toYou will be knowledgeable about our business and be on point for HR related questions (i.e. benefits, comp, etc)You will work to improve upon existing programs and develop innovative strategies around finding our future teamYou will develop relationships across multiple teamsYou will showcase your passion for the industry. That means intimate knowledge about market, target companies, relationships in open source networksYou will build pipelines from scratch, over and over again. How many candidates is it going to take for you to find the perfect fit?What You'll NeedEnglish verbal and written skills3+ years of experience in sourcing or recruitingExperience in sourcing or full-cycle recruiting in a fast-paced environmentExperience working with funnel data and using it to guide hiring decisionsHas experience hiring in an organization focused on cultivating a diverse workforce
